english.segment1: I watched. The stars. Roll from your eyes
english.segment2: Only to compensate. Disaster from your disguise. The Brilliance of your lies. Distance from the start. Relapse from the heart.
english.segment3: . Constance keep me, Or will she just keep staring
english.segment4: . I watched the leaves change. As you watched me slip away. I watched the leaves change. As you watched dreams fade to gray
english.segment5: Blister the eyes. Of plastered promises.
